channel.title: Flutter on Hutan Baghery Moghaddam
channel.description: Recent content in Flutter on Hutan Baghery Moghaddam

item.title: Building a Calorietracker WebApp with Flutter and Firebase
item.description: Preface Flutter is first and foremost a Framework to create cross-platform applications, but it can also be used to create WebApps. Since I don’t have any experience with the three big Web Frameworks: VueJS, React, and Angular, I thought Flutter would be a good fit for me. It also uses Dart instead Javascript. My initial impression was, that this is also an improvement. Since I have not made any proper experiences with other Web Frameworks or Javascript, I won’t be able to compare those to Flutter/Dart in this article.
